fields.name: Signature SouthRoast
fields.description: Our signature house blend of rich arabica beans and punchy robusta, roasted fresh every week to bring you that classic taste at its best every morning.

fields.name: Northern Dark
fields.description: Our darker and toastier house blend, roasted for deep and dark flavours, and those who like their coffee extra strong. A perfect brew for cold northern nights.

fields.name: Ethiopia
fields.description: A single origin blend that shows off the characteristic bright, fruity, electrifying flavours of the best of Ethiopian coffee.

fields.name: Summer Sun
fields.description: Our iconic seasonal summer blend, returning from last year! This blend is delicate and sweet, with a refreshing sharp acidity. An ideal cup for a warm morning and a sultry afternoon brew!

fields.name: Sumatra Special
fields.description: A truly unique and nuanced single-origin coffee from a family farm in Sumatra, this is for the coffee connoeisseur looking to expand and explore their palate with a rare and distinct profile.

fields.name: Bialetti - Small Moka Pot
fields.description: Bialetti are the Italian brand of choice for coffee drinkers who will appreciate the timeless design and reliable stability of the classic moka pot. Take good care of your moka pot, and it will make delicious coffee today and in 50 years!

fields.name: Comandante C40 Hand Coffee Grinder
fields.description: One of the best and most popular hand coffee grinders for coffee lovers with high standards. Capable of grinding for espresso and French press brewing equally well, this is a luxury hand grinder that offers an exceptional even grind and a pleasant, easy experience. Beautifully finished in natural American Cherry wood.

fields.name: Fellow Stagg - EKG Electric Kettle
fields.description: The Fellow Stagg is the kettle we use for pourover brews ourselves, both at home and at our HQ where we curate only the most attractive coffees to roast and sell. The Stagg kettle offers ideal temperature control and an even pour for improving your brews.

fields.name: Connoisseur Coffee Set
fields.description:
A luxury gift set containing; 
 - Fellow Stagg Electric Kettle, 
 - Comandante C40 Hand Coffee Grinder, 
 - Ceramic Pourover Filter with 100 Filter Papers, 
 - 100g Signature SouthRoast coffee beans, 
 - 100g Northern Dark Coffee Beans. 
 By no means inexpensive, we think this is ideal for the person who wants the best of the best and would like a complete, connossieur coffee experience. Everything you need to make a perfect cup of coffee and become an expert at-home brewer.
